title: American Airlines is adding 2 domestic routes from Boston in 2026, including a nearby island destination
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Flights The flights begin June 18, 2026.
Brant Point Lighthouse on Nantucket handout By Kristi Palma December 23, 2025 | 11:56 AM 1 minute to read Boston travelers will have another way of getting to Nantucket for summer fun in 2026.
American Airlines is adding two domestic routes from Logan Airport next summer: to Nantucket and Madison, Wisconsin, the airline announced on Thursday.

title: Wickedpedia: Why is the Green Line so loud?
author: Frances Klemm
bullets: Wickedpedia Unfortunately, there are a lot of reasons.
An MBTA Green Line train is lit with the brake lights of another train ahead of it on Huntington Avenue.
